headline: Sysco Verdict Puts Whistleblower Practices And Legal Risks Under Investor Scrutiny
summary: A California jury awarded significant damages to Sysco truck drivers and yard workers after finding that Sysco retaliated against employees who raised safety, wage, and regulatory concerns. The verdict concludes a whistleblower case focused on alleged retaliation against workers who spoke up about operational and compliance issues. Sysco, listed as NYSE:SYY, has stated that it intends to challenge the verdict. Sysco (NYSE:SYY) is a major foodservice distributor supplying restaurants,...
